title.description: The exact title of the research paper

journalName.description: Name of the journal where the paper was published

yearOfPublication.description: The year in which the paper was released

enumDescriptions.National: Funding agency is a national agency that carries a country's name

trialRegistration.description: Was the study registered in a registry? (Said that it was registered OR Said not registered OR did not say anything about registration)

registrationPlatform.description: If the study was registered, on which trial registration platform was it registered? (e.g., ClinicalTrials.gov, EU-CTR, ICTRP, did not say)

registrationNumber.description: If the study was registered, what is the trial registration number or identifier?

arabCountries.description: What are the names of the arab countries involved in the study? (Co-author affiliation or study site)

typeOfStudy.description: Was this a single-center or multi-center study?

enumDescriptions.singlecenter: The study was conducted in one site. If no mention of site names, locations, or quantity, assume single center.
enumDescriptions.multicenter: Multi center study. Assume multicenter if explicitly states that more than one center or site participated in the study (data came from more than one place)

correspondingAuthorCountry.description: What is the country of the corresponding author?

recruitingSite.description: What is the total number of study sites involved in the study?

pilotRCT.description: Whether a pilot RCT was conducted prior: Yes, No, or Not mentioned

enumDescriptions.notdone: No pilot preceded the present study.
enumDescriptions.done: Pilot study performed before the present study was conducted.

therapeuticArea.description: disease or therapeutic area addressed in the study

targetGroup.description: Which patient group did the study target?

totalParticipants.description: What is the total number of study participants

methodSampleSource.description: Sample source or participant recruitment method (hospital, outpatient, community.)

methodRandomization.description: Was randomization (patient allocation into different groups) performed (yes, no, not mentioned)?

methodRandomizationRatio.description: What was the ratio of randomization? For example, 1:1 if patients were randomized to equivalent groups., 1:2 if double the number of patients was in a group, etc...

methodBlocking_.description: Was blocking performed (Yes. No, Not Mentioned)

methodConcealment.description: Was concealment performed (yes, no, not mentioned)

Age.description: Age distribution. It is usually found in a table.

StandardDeviation.description: Standard deviation (Also known as SD) of age of patients in the group. It usually follows the character ±

MeanAge.description: Mean age of patients in the group. Age (y) or age (years) as row or column titles. The value is usually in the form of x ± y

MedianAge.description: Median age of patients in the group.

IQR_Age.description: Interquartile range of patients in the group

InterventionName.description: Name of specific intervention employed in the study

typeOfComparator.description: Type of comparator: Placebo, Standard care, an active comparator, or usual care, or none

placebo.description: Was placebo was used as comparator?

standardOfCare.description: Whether standard of care (usual care) was used as comparator

activeComparator.description: What is the name of the thing that the Intervention is being compared with?

otherComparator.description: Other type of comparator used (if applicable), with specification

statisticalTypeOfPrimaryOutcome.description: Statistical type: Binary/dichotomous, Continuous, Categorical, Ordinal, or Other

outcomeType.description: Outcome structure: Single outcome or Composite outcome

powerCalculation.description: Was power calculated for the sample size?

assumptions.description: Where assumptions for power calculation stated a priori?

justification.description: Was a justification for sample size provided?

adaptiveSampleSize.description: Was an adaptive sample size design used?

ittPrimaryMethod.description: Was intention-to-treat (ITT) analysis the primary method?

ppPrimaryMethod.description: Was per-protocol (PP) analysis the primary method?

bothIttPpSignificant.description: Whether both ITT and PP analyses were statistically significant

onlyPpSignificant.description: Whether only PP analysis was statistically significant

primaryModeOfPresentation.description: Primary mode of presenting results: Relative effect or Absolute effect

adjustedEstimate.description: Was the primary outcome an adjusted estimate?

reportedPValue.description: Was a p-value reported for the primary outcome or estimate?

TotalRandomized.description: Total number of patients who were randomized

TotalCompletedFollowup.description: What was the total number of patients who completed the study?

lossFollowUp.description: What was the reported number of patients who did not complete follow-up?

earlyStoppingEfficacy.description: Was the trial terminated early because interim analysis demonstrated significant result?

earlyStoppingFutility.description: Is there mention of the trial being terminated early because interim analysis demonstrated no benefit?

controlGroupEventRate.description: What was the primary event rate in the control group?

observedExactValue.description: What was the observed value of the primary outcome?

precisionOfAssumption.description: Is precision of assumptions related to power calculation reported?

expectedVsActualDelta.description: What was mentioned regarding effect size inflation?

expectedVsActualEffectSize.description: What was mentioned on how the effect differs among the group?

pilotRCTquestion.description: Is there mention of a pilot study that preceded this work?

handlingMissingData.description: Were there missing data. And how were they adjusted?

ProportionFemale.description: Absolute number or proportion or ratio of females in the group

ProportionMale.description: Absolute number or proportion or ratio of males in the group

MeanAge.description: Mean age of patients in the group

SD_Age.description: Standard deviation (also known as SD) of age of patients in the group.

MedianAge.description: Median age of patients in the group

IQR_Age.description: Interquartile range of patients in the group

funder.description: name of organization that funded the work

TypeOfRCT.description: What is the Phase of the Clinical Trial?

enumDescriptions.phase1: This is a Phase I (phase 1) clinical trial.
enumDescriptions.phase2: This is a Phase II (phase 2) clinical trial
enumDescriptions.phase3: This is a Phase III (phase 3) clinical trial
enumDescriptions.phase4: This is a Phase IV (phase 4) clinical trial
enumDescriptions.NotMentioned: Phase of clinical trial is not mentioned
